tasks.server-dev: deno task cache && deno run --allow-all --watch app.ts dev
tasks.client-dev: deno task cache && cd client && deno run -A --node-modules-dir npm:vite
tasks.build: deno task cache && cd client && deno run -A --node-modules-dir npm:vite build
tasks.serve: deno task cache && deno run --allow-all app.ts
